dcterms:description: The EndoVis 2015 dataset provides annotations for both rigid and articulated robotic instruments in laparoscopic surgery, focusing solely on robotic instruments.
dcterms:title: EndoVis 2015

dcterms:creator: E. Colleoni
P. Edwards
D. Stoyanov
dcterms:description: The UCL dVRK dataset includes synthetic and real inputs for tool segmentation in robotic surgery, providing a diverse set of images for training and evaluation.
dcterms:title: UCL dVRK

dcterms:creator: A. Schmidt
O. Mohareri
S. DiMaio
S. E. Salcudean
dcterms:description: The STIR dataset consists of surgical tattoos in infrared, providing a unique perspective for analyzing surgical scenes.
dcterms:title: STIR
